author: Special Correspondent
text:
Power shutdown

Power supply will be disrupted in the following areas coming under .the Masa Koundachettipalayam substation from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. on Monday: Masa Koundachettipalayam, Ponne Koundan Pudur, M. Raayarpaalayam, Sunda Medu, Chenna CHettipudur, Maanikampaalayam, Kallippalayam, Thottiyanur (a part) and Oraikkaal Palayam.
title: Tangedco announcement
